item.title: Check if databases are empty
item.description: To check if MariaDB/MySQL databases are empty in your DB Server, run the following query: MariaDB [(none)]> SELECT table_schema, # "DB Name", -> Round(Sum(data_length + index_length) / 1024 / 1024, 1) # "DB Size in MB" -> FROM information_schema.tables -> GROUP BY table_schema; +--------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+ | table_schema | Round(Sum(data_length + index_length) / 1024 / 1024, 1) | +--------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+ | facultyblog | 970.5 | | information_schema | 0.2 | | laxnews | 65.
